name: The Nexus Engineers
description: A guild specializing in the design, construction, and maintenance of the station's infrastructure and technology.

name: The Cosmic Artisans
description: A guild devoted to creating art, entertainment, and experiences that enrich the lives of the station's inhabitants.

name: The Astro-Medics
description: A guild focused on providing healthcare, medical research, and ensuring the well-being of the population.

name: The Interstellar Merchants
description: A guild engaged in trade, commerce, and the exchange of goods and services throughout the station.

name: The Void Seekers
description: A guild dedicated to exploration, discovery, and uncovering the mysteries of the universe.
